price: 10. Sideedaba faqa (xun) waa uun (camal) Shaydaan6, si uu u murug geliyo kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey, waxbase ma uu yeeli karo haba yaraatee wuxuu Alle idmo maahee, Allaah uun ha isku halleeyeen oo tala saarteen mu’miniinta.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّجۡوَىٰ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ لِيَحۡزُنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيۡسَ بِضَآرِّهِمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: 6. Waxaa loola jeedaa sida muuqata hadalka xanta ah iyo xumaan ku tashiga.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-najwā mina al-shayṭāni liyaḥzuna alladhīna āmanū walaysa biḍārrihim shayan illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
